mapper.select: SELECT db.DB_ID, db.`NAME` as dbname, a.TBL_ID, a.TBL_NAME, a.TBL_TYPE, d.TYPE_NAME as col_type_name, d.`COMMENT` as col_comment, d.COLUMN_NAME FROM TBLS a LEFT JOIN SDS b ON a.SD_ID = b.SD_ID LEFT JOIN COLUMNS_V2 d ON b.CD_ID = d.CD_ID LEFT JOIN DBS db ON a.DB_ID = db.DB_ID
mapper.insert: insert into col_tbl_db SELECT db.DB_ID as db_id, db.`NAME` as db_name, a.TBL_ID as tbl_id, a.TBL_NAME as tbl_name, a.TBL_TYPE as tbl_type, d.TYPE_NAME as col_type_name, d.`COMMENT` as col_comment, d.COLUMN_NAME as column_name FROM TBLS a LEFT JOIN SDS b ON a.SD_ID = b.SD_ID LEFT JOIN COLUMNS_V2 d ON b.CD_ID = d.CD_ID LEFT JOIN DBS db ON a.DB_ID = db.DB_ID
